sentences.sContent: Mr. Ying is one of those happy people who derive pleasure from helping others.
sentences.sCn: 英先生是那种助人为乐的快活人。

sentences.sContent: ...as poorer people derive a much higher proportion of their income directly from the natural resources around them...

remMethod.val: de ＋ rive(r) → 黄河是中华文明的发源地 → 起源

words.tran: 得到；推断（derive的过去分词）；由…而来

trans.tranOther: to get something, especially an advantage or a pleasant feeling, from something
